string-array.name: tutorialMessages
string-array.item: Welcome to Overwatch Recommend, the app for recommending an Overwatch hero given a match composition.
Start by dragging heroes from the center to the ally and enemy teams.
Select your map followed by your object: attack or defend. When playing a control map, select the stage rather than attack or defend.
Hit CHOOSE to reorder the heroes. The top left hero is the best choice given the scenario.
Use the RESET button at the top right to reset the hero\'s position and the DELTE button to clear everything.
Use your own judgement when selecting heroes. The top five heroes are all excellent choices. Good luck and have fun!
